author: {'steamid': '76561198010894623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 1192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 279, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1712167420}
review:
Dentro dos Top 3 melhores jogos que já joguei em toda vida.
- Sonho de toda criança, ver a trilogia do Indiana Jones e depois passar esse jogo pra ela jogar. Se eu tiver um filho, esse jogo vai ser obrigatório terminar, depois vai me agradecer.
- História sensacional, jogabilidade muito agradável, dificuldade alta, campanha longa, proporciona mais de 20 horas de jogo sem rush (Jogando como foi feito para jogar).
- Constante alteração de cenários, o que permite uma abordagem bem no estilo indiana jones.
- Quem olhou os filmes, esse aqui serve como um ótimo complemento.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092558233', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1545717311}
review:
Has not aged well whatsoever. Get this game for the nostalgia, not for the gameplay.

Update: after five hours of playing this buggy garbage, I wish I could downvote this game twice. This game has no redeemable qualities aside from nostalgia. The controls are absolutely horrendous, the camera can be uncontrollable at times, making you take leaps of faith some times. The combat in this game is extremely exploitable: just use hand-to-hand combat and spam the hell out of the LMB and RMB. Jumping can be broken at times; sometimes Indy won't jump when you press the Spacebar, and other times he'll bang off a wall and fall to his death. Swinging from chains/ropes is also broken at times; he won't swing forward, just backwards.

Awful addition to an otherwise pretty solid series. I don't remember it being this God-awful. Stay far, far away from this game, even while it's on sale.

P.S: I know it's from 15 years ago, but some of this shit is inexcusable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078530844', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 151, 'playtime_forever': 921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 921, 'last_played': 1545300259}
review:
“DON’T call me Junior!” (C) IJ :)
Ah, nostalgic :) Just finished it. Great game of my childhood about favorite adventure cinema series.
For 2003 it has some nice details. Hat that Indy can loose and pick up using action button, throwable objects, different walking animations depending on water level you are going through. Typical IJ jokes in cutscenes.
Overall I like it very much. Could not finish years ago because of a bug. This version is ok. Got a "serious" bug only once - could not use inventory. Also Alt+Tab crashes the game.
Basically it's Lara Croft from the world of men :)
One serious downside for me: when you die - you have to start the level from the very beginning. Good thing - levels are short.
But I think there is a place in hell for those who made 2 levels: The Path of Unseen Peril and The Pillars of the Underworld. I hate when you fail just on the last jump. Such games always need manual saves imho.
Buy it even not on sale - it's very nice and plays great anyway. Just use widescreen fix.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072729121', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1545148080}
review: This game remains the best Indiana Jones game ever made. The campaign is good and fun. If you're an Indy fan, this is for you. The Emperor's Tomb story is original (not adapted after one of the movies) and it feels like one of the 3 Indy classic movies, just a bit watered down.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161205253', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 300, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1543941387}
review: Ich habe wirklich nichts erwartet und es damals auch nicht gespielt, aber dieses Spiel ist wirklich toll. Es ist ähnlich wie die alten Tomb Raider-Spiele, jedoch etwas actionlastiger. Allerdings sollte man sich davon nicht täuschen lassen, denn die Sprungeinlagen sind teilweise wirklich anspruchsvoll. Ist halt ein Spiel der alten Generation. Es gab (für mich) ein paar nervige Stellen im Spiel, da die Steuerung etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig ist. Ansonsten ist die Atmosphäre wirklich großartig, es ist in deutscher Sprache und vor allem es lief bei mir unter Windows 10 einwandfrei. Windows 10 ist ja bei alten Spielen immer so ein Problem. Zuletzt noch natürlich der faire Preis erwähnt.

review: Игра детства! До сих пор в нее играю, познакомился с ней когда мне было годика 4. Батя помню купил, поставил на комп, так и началось все. Игра очень интересная, и захватывающая. От нее невозможно оторваться, и хочешь ее проходить снова и снова, графика для своего времени очень крутая. В этой игре, можно в некоторых моментах даже поржать, например над драками :). author: {'steamid': '76561198001490367', 'num_games_owned': 650, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 716, 'last_played': 1543898406}
review:
[b][h1] “15 Years later of Fortune and Glory” [/h1][/b]
Back in the day when LucasArts published quality games, one of them was Indiana Jones and the Emperor’s Tomb developed by The Collective in 2003. Follow the story of archeologist named Dr. Henry Walton “Indiana” Jones, action heroes of 1930s film and light novels who travel in great journey for mysterious artifact and fighting against corruption and Nazis force.

---------------------------------------------------------
[h1]To the Land of Dragons[/h1]
The story of the Emperor’s Tomb takes place in 1935 before The Temple of Doom film of franchise. Dr. Jones receives an assignment from Chinese officers to retrieve “Heart of the Dragon” of the first Emperor of China “Qin Shi Huangdi” before it falls into evil forces. The journey leads you to various locations from Prague great castle to the Peak of Penglai Mountain in China while things are getting complicate. I’m appreciated the connection between location and story. There are some decent cutscenes to engage storytelling and voice acting does great job to represent Dr. Jones aside from the films. Each NPC also have their mixed English voice and their native languages which are nice touch. The Emperor’s Tomb might not have mind-blowing twist compared to films and novels, but it keeps you engaging at the end of each chapter to the end.

The game music is created by various composer and orchestra team. Classic Indiana Jones theme is never get old along with mixed theme for each location and in-game event. The sound design in both exploration and combat are great. Give clear sense on what you’re approaching. 

---------------------------------------------------------
[h1]Exploring The Hidden World[/h1]
The Emperor’s Tomb is an action adventure game. It’s a second installment that applies fully 3D characters and gameplay. It involves around beat em' up combat, climbing, and logical puzzles. There are 10 locations in campaign. Each one divide into 10-15 mins sub chapters. Because of short chapter, there is no checkpoint or manual save. The game only saves between ends of chapter which encourages you to play smartly especially on hard difficulty. There are collectables hidden in some levels which rewards you with concept arts.

The climbing and jumping is considered old type adventure game where you’ve to face in right direction before perform action. Your character will simply climb up as you move forward or jump in right direction, but you can’t changes direction when moving on mid-air. You mainly progress through complex level by reading environment and perform some special moves (rolling, swimming, and swing across ledge by your whip). Some levels contain traps and puzzles, but it’s quite easy to figure out as the cutscene and environment will gently guide you. Thanks to well level designs and some amazing visuals.

---------------------------------------------------------
[h1]Beat Em’ Up or Fight with Tools[/h1]
The Emperor’s Tomb also heavily focuses on combat which offers very fun and engaging combat. You mostly encounter human type enemies with different weapon, combo, and fighting style. In close combat, you attack with combination of left and right mouse click creating various combos. You can grab enemy by pressing both left and right click and perform special move such as uppercut and pushing in direction. Your whip can disarm enemy’s weapon, create distance in fight, or even drag enemy neck and give a blow to their faces. Combine with environment and various melee weapons, it creates raw brawling gameplay and satisfied feedback (you can make chain collision between enemy characters which is hilarious). Whenever you take damage, you can quick heal by using medkit or running and drinking canteen which can be refilled from wall fountains in level.

The game also offers decent gunfight and a lot of firearms from classic crossbow to MP-40 machine gun; your character will automatically aim to nearest target. It lacks of lock-on option and higher rate you fire result lower accuracy. Otherwise, you need to aim manually in first person view by holding C which is not quite convenient. Yet, it’s still fun and chaotic especially when dealing enemy group.

---------------------------------------------------------
[h1]A Quite Rough Journey[/h1]
I found The Emperor’s Tomb runs smoothly in modern hardware with few tweaking in few minutes (higher resolution than 1280x760, uncap framerate, wildscreen fix). Variety of enemy type and reaction (pick up weapon when they’re unarmed, push you to ledge, counter attacks, run to cover). The major problem I found is camera issue. Camera sensitively swings when player rotate camera around tight spot. There’s few difficult spike on some levels. Also, there is rare case when player is not allowed to move up when grabbing ledge, force player to drop as the game has ridiculous indicator of height for fall damage (You take damage where you drop from same human height platform). Alt-Tab during chapter run will instantly crash the game, but opening task manager works fine.

---------------------------------------------------------
[h1]Verdict[/h1]
The Emperor’s Tomb might have some outdate technical design and more action packed than previous title “Infernal Machine”. But for 2003 game, it’s amazing and fun adventure which doesn’t need trendy modern gimmicks to support its original complexity. It holds something special in my childhood which modern adventure games probably miss. I highly recommend to all action adventure games.

[quote][i]If you found this review helpful, please consider and give a thumb up or feedback to improve my review[/i][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198054354367', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1543891559}
review: Игра из детства, саундтрек из детства, чашка кофе – вечера ностальгии и прекрасного настроения!! Помню в те давние времена казалось очень круто то что во время драки с Инди может слететь шляпа и ты ее можешь потом подобрать. Техническое исполнение казалось кинематографическое. Индиана Джонс один из проектов, внесших огромный вклад в последующие приключенческие проекты, взять хотя бы Натана Дрейка, много можно найти схожести. И Натан Дрейк и Лара Крофт любимые археологи, но только после Индиана Джонса. В 2018 играется неплохо, поддержка геймпада (я играл с xbox one контроллера), поддержка современных ОС, игра залочена на 30 фпс, но это нисколько не проблема, играется комфортно, глюков в игре не замечено. Оценка 10 из 10, меньше никак нельзя дать. И спасибо конечно за то, что игра появилась в Стиме, бесценный подарок олдскульной публике

author: {'steamid': '76561198330507718', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1542827291}
review: Truly exellent game! The controls are as smooth as it gets and the graphics were ahead of its time! It really makes you feel like Indiana Jones. Switching items is a little wonky and it seems you are only allowed to shoot enemies, even though you are given a machete and a whip, but the game makes up for it as you are granted auto aim! Super helpful! Here's a little summary of the game(spoilers!): In Indiana Jones® and the Emperor's Tomb™, you play as Indiana Joes going through the Emperor's Tomb. Now that's a story if ive ever seen one! I really can't recommend this game enough, one of the best games i've played in a long while. I give it a solid 9.5/10, absolutely amazing!

author: {'steamid': '76561198090608579', 'num_games_owned': 986, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1543041680}
review:
เป็นเกม Indiana Jones ที่สนุกที่สุดที่เคยทำมา ผมเคยเล่นเกมนี้ตอนสมัยเด็กๆคิดถึงมากครับ เกมแนวผจญภัย ตะลุยด่าน แก้ไขปริศนา จริงๆเกมเคยว่าขาย GOG ไปก่อนหน้านี้แล้วแต่เพิ่งลง Steam ครับ เลยต้องจัดมาเล่นอีกซักรอบ 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1572697487 


สำหรับเพื่อนๆที่ซื้อมาเล่นแล้วมีปัญหาไม่เต็มจอ จอเล็กไป ให้ไปโหลด ไฟล์เพิ่มเติมมาตามด้านล่างครับ

วิธีปรับค่า Resolution 
- โหลดไฟล์ IndianaJones_EmperorsTomb.7z ที่เว็บ [url= www.wsgf.org/dr/indiana-jones-and-emperors-tomb/en] คลิก	[/url]
- เข้าไปในไฟล์แล้วเลือกขนาด Resolution ตามต้องการ 
- เข้าไปในโฟล์เดอร์  แล้วลากทั้ง 3 ไฟล์ R_D3D.dll , indy.exe และ GCore.dll
- ลากไปไว้ที่ โฟลเดอร์เกม GameData\bin 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1572697574

วิธีเพิ่มเฟรมเรทเป็น 60

- ให้ไปที่โฟลเดอร์เกม Steam\steamapps\common\Indiana Jones and the Emperors Tomb\GameData\indy
- เปิดไฟล์ vars.cfg ด้วบ Text Editor
- หาบรรทัดที่เขียนว่า fpsLimit เปลี่ยนจาก 30 เป็น 60 หรือเลขอื่นๆตามต้องการเช่น fpsLimit=120
- กด Save เป็นอันเสร็จครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198866039232', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1554219278}
review: J'avais 10 ans quand je jouais à ce jeu sur la Xbox première du nom. Je me souviens de chaque petit détail qui le composait : la musique, les effets sonores, le gameplay et surtout ces crocodiles de l'enfer ! Incarner Indy était tellement palpitant. Lors des sauts ou du déploiement du fouet je gesticulais dans tous les sens avec ma manette. Et la plupart du temps ... je rageais ! Bref blague à part, ce jeu est un petit bijou sous-estimé. Le gameplay et les graphismes sont loin d'être passés de mode aujourd'hui. Je ne sais pas si c'est la nostalgie qui parle mais pour moi l'immersion est là. J'irai même jusqu'à dire que le jeu dépasse de loin le dernier film de la franchise, mais ça c'est une autre histoire. Ah oui et la caméra tient la route, ce qui n'était pas forcément le cas de certains jeux du genre en 2003. En bref, je considère ce jeu comme l'Uncharted de l'époque, si vous êtes fan d'Indiana prenez-le il en vaut la peine !

author: {'steamid': '76561197999852894', 'num_games_owned': 778, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1542821827}
review:
Великолепная игра, классика экшен-адвенчур времен PS2 со всеми вытекающими, но с одним большим "НО" – отвратительное отношение к покупателю. В 2018 году нам продают игру 2003 года, ровно такой, какой она была на релизе, 15 лет назад. 

Готовьтесь наслаждаться ограничением FPS в 30 кадров, отсутствием поддержки широкоформатных мониторов, частично функционирующим геймпадам, невозможностью смотреть трансляцию друга по этой игре через функционал Steam, а также отсутствием русской локализации (которая, к слову, 15 лет назад, была не только в виде субтитров, но и в формате аудио). 

Собственно, за что с покупателя просят деньги? За то, что он самостоятельно должен качать костыли со сторонних ресурсов, и приводить игру в адекватное состояние? Здесь нет даже такой элементарной мелочи, которая с годами стала обязательной – наличия достижений, которые можно было добавить с легкостью. Над игрой просто не захотели работать, небольшую часть проблем, вроде ограничения FPS, можно убрать, поковырявшись в игровых файлах через блокнот, но даже это скинули на плечи игроков. Зато нажиться на людской ностальгии и известном бренде – сам Бог велел. 150 рублей это не такие уж большие деньги в наши дни, но отдавать их за откровенную халтуру совсем не хочется. Если хотите вспомнить былое, либо ознакомиться с классикой, то вперед на трекер за блурей ГОГ-версией. А деньги потратьте на себя, сделав себе небольшой подарок, вроде кружки хорошего горячего черного кофе, а не на тех, кто хочет нажиться на ваших чувствах.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152926942', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1542832234}

author: {'steamid': '76561198040524850', 'num_games_owned': 570, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1705741339}
review:
I bought this game out of pure nostalgia alone

I remember being 4 years old, watching my dad on our original Xbox play this game through, and I only beat it myself till I was 13.
Now I'm 19, and saw this game got released on Steam, and [i]had[/i] those old memories.

This game, is one of the purest hidden gems for the Xbox Original, and is worth every penny.

Don't be afraid to install some 1080p mods, just to warn those, this game [b]Does not support modern X-input controllers[/b] It cannot read thumbstick, or trigger imputs, but thankfully the keyboard controls are pretty solid, except the camera, which has a mind of its own.


Ever wanted to kill nazis in Atlantis? Imperial China? Prague? [b]Buy this treat[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198091037039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1546869474}
review: L'ho giocato un'infinità di volte sulla prima Xbox e pensavo di non giocarci mai più, ma ora lo propongono qui su Steam. Che dire, uno dei migliori giochi di avventura di tutti i tempi, a parer mio anche più dei vari Uncharted, per quanto siano più nuovi (probabilmente è il fattore nostalgia). La trama è splendida proprio come i film, così come le musiche e le meccaniche. Tecnicamente scorre molto bene, non ho riscontrato bug e in generale mi sembra molto ben ottimizzato. Consigliato 100 volte!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198086576557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 825, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 777, 'last_played': 1687767208}
review:
HOW TO GET 60 FPS

Go to your Steam directory

steamapps > common > Indiana Jones and the Emperors Tomb > GameData > Indy

Edit the vars.cfg with a text editor

Change FPS Limit = '30' to '120' (Or a number of your choosing)

Enjoy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984228275', 'num_games_owned': 3064, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1692206983}
review:
http://www.wsgf.org/f/u/contrib/dr/29713/hacks/IndianaJones_EmperorsTomb.7z Here is higher resolutions. Very good game. Has cloud saves. Works on windows 10.

60 FPS
1 Go to <path-to-game>\GameData\indy\ 
2. Open default.cfg with a text editor 
3. Set (or add) vsyncinterval:2 

4. Go to <path-to-game>\GameData\indy\ 
5. Open vars.cfg with a text editor 
6. Change fpsLimit=30 to fpsLimit=60 
Notes: FPS over 60 may cause bugs in game.

review: Indy's fluid animations and smooth controls are impressive for the game's age. author: {'steamid': '76561198336256389', 'num_games_owned': 404, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1542780033}
review: Is it a bit janky? Yes. Is it at times immensely frustrating? Most definetly. Does it make me relive my childhood and fill me with nostalgic giddy? Absolutely. This was one of those big games for me as a child. You know the one I mean, that one that's really irritatingly difficult as a kid but something about it kept dragging you back to it. After many attempts 7 year old me managed to beat this game and it has since secured itself a very special place in my gaming career. I don't know how the game would be for someone who doesnt have nostalgia for it, but for me theres something very unique about this game that makes it an easy recommendation if your looking for something different

author: {'steamid': '76561198010909251', 'num_games_owned': 892, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1542555459}
review:
"Indiana Jones and the Emperor's Tomb" - это:
- Когда после отличной Драки, ты ишешь свою слетевшую шляпу прежде, чем идти дальше!
- Когда чувак стоит на балконе спиной, а ты бросаешь ему в затылок бутылку, и он летит с балкона с протяжённым криком.
- Когда выдёргиваешь оружие из рук противников ударом глытса!
- Когда маджахед бросает в тебя гранату, а ты хватаешь её и бросаешь обратно, та попадает ему в голову и он падает!
- Когда бьёшь мужика со стулом лопатой, на отмаш.
- Когда ты приближаешься к концу короткой игры, а оказывается, что это первая из 10 глав.
- "вНимаНь-ье ИзОверХиар!" (с)
- "Хха! ИндиАнаЖдОоОунс!" (с)
- Отличное музыкальное оформление, в стиле фильма.
- Старая, местами кривенькая игра с настоящим духом фильмов об Индиане Джонсе! 
Которую я проходил в 2003 г на клавомыши.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066526810', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 1442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1633860476}
review:
EDIT: There is a bug when I exit the game, it still says its running on steam even though its 'not'. All you need to do is end "Slayer.exe" in task manager or any other way and it will close the game properly and sync afterwards. Hope this helps, if you've come accross this issue!

The Review:

~ So i wrote this review before i installed the game, but yeah, you gotta play it first (duh) so i played it for a bit so i could post this review! P.S the game is amazing! ~

What I originally posted: I have not even intalled this game yet on Steam, but I just thought I'd get the review over with since I've played and finished the game countless times (somewhere between 5 and 11 but i can't remember) back in the good ol' days of Spyro, Crash, Burnout, Lilo and Stitch and all the legendary PS2 games that make masterpieces like Skyrim, Black Ops 1 (or any other modern day creation for that matter) look like they missed the hype train. 
Cause damn, when i saw this on Steam, not only did i start laughing (literally, don't judge me), I bought it and set it to download.

Really, its a CLASSIC or as close to one as games go. Its fun, its immersive and its worth every cent, with regards to storyline and game length. It is level and area-based and its awesome. I can go into detail about certain character developments and story progression, but nah, its a great game and its part of my gaming childhood and I highly recommend it to anyone into any game of any kind. Its so worth it (Thanks Valve for finally adding BTW)

10/10 Giant Albino Crocodiles!
99/100 Krakens! 
5/5 Chinese Ninjas!
99% Nazi Antagonists!
1000/1000 Dragon Emperors!

~ GET IT! Its better than Tomb Raider and Assassin's Creed! ~

author: {'steamid': '76561198269795661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1554400213}
review: I loved this game when I was younger, back when Lucasarts was a thing.  It's still a great game to this day, minus the dated graphics and gameplay but if you are an Indiana Jones fan, you will like this game. It captures the spirit of what an Indiana Jones game should be: adventure, puzzles, story, orchestral music (which is extraordinary for a game like this), and action. The camera is a little clunky but again, this game was made in 2003.  For its price, I would recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198289345761', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1586308080}
review:
This game was made in 2003, and yet it has more detail than most games made in 2018. The graphics may be outdated, the camera is a bit shit, the framerate cap is at a good 30 (which is fine that was the 2003 standard) and you might be playing in a bad resolution but the game is worth the buy.

RIP Lucas Arts, you will be remembered. 1982 - 2013

P.S. Thank you Disney, for bringing our childhoods back, first battlefront 2, now this. Brings a tear to my fucking eye.

In a more serious note, buy this game if you want a good time and see the father of Nathan Drake and Laura Croft.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067112834', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1542566880}
review:
IT'S FINALLY ON STEAM! I already gave up hope because the game was added to GOG like 2.5 years ago.
If you have never played this game, in short, this is the best Indiana Jones game ever made. I completed it a dozen times at least. Now, I want to list a few of the most remarkable things about the game.
1. Music. Ambient music is a masterpiece. Extremely atmospheric. During combat there is orchestral music, which is simply brilliant, and it means a lot from someone who hates orchestral music like me. This game is worth buying even solely for the music.
2. Combat. Platforming sections play a major role in the game, but there's nothing too exceptional about them. The combat though is incredibly enjoyable, despite being two-button and having just a few combos. That is, if you fight with fists or melee weapons. There are guns, and sometimes they are useful, but I recommend not to use them too often - the game is much more enjoyable without them.
3. Atmosphere. It's one of the most atmospheric games I've ever played, and I've played a lot, trust me. 
Also, it's worth mentioning that unlike in movies, where Indiana spent most of the time in one place, there are quite a few of different and sometimes unexpected locations. It definitely contributes to the atmosphere of adventure.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170444981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1659067644}
review:
Eggs. Eggs set up the  filling. They give the filling its rich, luxurious texture.
Heavy cream. Heavy cream makes it luxurious and silky smooth. It’s thick, creamy, and absolutely heavenly in this recipe. I use 1 cup of heavy cream and 1/4 cup of milk. I found that 1 and 1/4 cups of heavy cream (or more) was simply too much. Too thick, too gloppy! You can also use the heavy cream to make homemade whipped cream for the topping.
Cornstarch. A starch thickener is one of the most important ingredients in a filling. I use a touch of cornstarch in my recipe because it helps set up. Makes it a little sturdier and firm, while keeping everything smooth.
Homemade pie crust (full recipe makes 2 crusts: 1 for bottom, 1 for leaf decor)
one 15oz can (about 2 cups; 450g) pumpkin puree*
3 large eggs
1 and 1/4 cups (250g) packed light or dark brown sugar
1 Tablespoon (8g) cornstarch
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 and 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon
1/2 teaspoon ground ginger*
1/4 teaspoon ground or freshly grated nutmeg*
1/8 teaspoon ground cloves*
1/8 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper
1 cup (240ml) heavy cream
1/4 cup (60ml) milk (I use 1% – any is fine)
egg wash: 1 large egg beaten with 1 Tablespoon milk

author: {'steamid': '76561198058104146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1544452272}
review:
Я ждал эту игру в STEAM очень...И ОЧЕНЬ долгое время и она наконец-таки появилась в STEAM и я сразу же купил её. Это игра детства, просто лучшая в своём жанре! Дрейк с Ларой ещё даже не были в планах, а Индиана Джонс уже во всю исследовал гробницы, бил морды проклятым бандитам, нацистам и прочим врагам стоящих на пути нашего Индианы и конечно же спасался от невероятных монстров (Чего только стоит гигантский Аллигатор.. до сих пор мурашки по коже..) . В этой игре прекрасно всё, в ней:  Прекрасные уровни, замечательная музыка, атмосфера того времени, сложные враги и зачастую лучше использовать оружие, а не драться кулаками, небольшой ассортимент оружия, от мачете до взрывчатки. Советую всем кто пропустил эту игру, просто ЛУЧШАЯ!

P.S. 

         *1)Если кого смущает, что нет русского языка, то скачайте русификацию текста с 
              сайта PlayGround.RU, работает всё хорошо и никаких ошибок нет.

        *2)Игра работает при 30 FPS, убрать это ограничение можно по этому пути 
             "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Indiana Jones and the Emperors 
            Tomb\GameData\indy" там мы находим файл "vars.cfg" открываем его и видим 
             "fpsLimit=30", я его поставил на "90", в игре стало FPS 75 стабильные.

        *3)Для тех у кого широкоформатные экраны, скачайте с PlayGround.RU "Widescreen 
             Fix"

author: {'steamid': '76561198043286259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1679032095}
review:
The Best and Greatest Indiana Jones game ever made! 

Yes it's from 2003 and so the puzzles, combat and story are a little dated but I loved it 
then and still do now.

To this day, it's still the best globe-trekking, nazi killing, treasure hunting video game 
adaption of Indiana Jones ever.

Fortune and Glory to whoever put this old gem on Steam
